website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty outdoor club chair is designed to withstand years of sun rays and weather.
pros: Crafted from cast aluminum for long lasting furniture
Option to purchase matching loveseat and coffee table
Customers appreciate the aluminum's beautiful design
cons: A little pricier when compared with other similar models

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the white wooden rocking chairs  on my front porch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for the short end of my covered front porch. I purchased cushions at a local Home store because without them the back was uncomfortable and the seat was a bit low. Unfortunately the back pillow hides the beautiful design but it can’t be helped. The color of the chair is a matte black. I assembled it myself in about 30 minutes using only the tools that came with it. The diagram could’ve been clearer so I suggest that you familiarize yourself with the list of screws, washers and nuts before you begin. The chair is sturdy and comfortable. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: maelou

customer_reviews.title: False advertising...this is not a club chair, it's an arm chair...
customer_reviews.text: it has a picture of the club chair on the box, but it contains an arm chair. I thought it was a mistake, so I bought it a second time. Twice I had to return this 'club chair' because it is just an "arm chair" to their dining set.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: SCAMMERS
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable and NOT as advertised. Cheap machining and rough edges everywhere. These are not club chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Moran

customer_reviews.title: Nice, and made in good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy , and of good quality. was a bit difficult to install by myself. A second person can help a lot.. I purchased matching mattresses to make it perfect. Survived the first winter without any damage, looks very attractive .
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Appearence
customer_reviews.text: This is my second chair ordered. Need to obtain seat cushions for both chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H. Bastian

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected a cozy club chair. The seat is too shallow and narrow. It’s comfortable as a dining chair, once you add a cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy McGill

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, heavier than you would think,and easy to assemble, although it takes some time.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelK

customer_reviews.title: Quality is sub.
customer_reviews.text: The aluminum has flaws in it where it is obvious to anyone sitting on the chair. It has dents and scratches on the finish on the arm of the chair. Photos available.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Looks like will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: For use on lower patio deck. In weather 24/7 365. Looks like will last a long time. Well made and easy to put together. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Moore

customer_reviews.title: well worth it
customer_reviews.text: For use on lower patio. In weather 24/7 364. Looks like will last a long time. Well made and easy to put together. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Moore

product_meta.title: Crosley Furniture CO6103-BK Sedona Solid-Cast Aluminum Outdoor Club Chair, Black
product_meta.description: Style:Club ChairIt may be hot outside, but you'll feel cool kicking back in Crosley Furniture's heavy duty, solid-cast aluminum furniture. Designed for style and built to last, this club chair features a durable charcoal black powder coated finish that will weather the harshest of outdoor conditions. Experience pure nirvana while unwinding in the chair's comfortable contoured seats. Your very own outdoor oasis awaits you.
feature_bullets: Elegantly designed Club Chair with intricately woven details
Heavy duty cast aluminum construction, perfect for outdoor entertaining
Maintenance free and UV resistant charcoal black finish
A perfect match for the Sedona Collection Loveseat and Cocktail Table

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars17 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
